GuideText1: FoldDesktop is a collapsible desktop widget
GuideText2: If you have many desktop files, you can use it to quickly hide and show icons
GuideText3: Move the mouse to the left side to display the menu, and fold / expand the widget
GuideText4: It is recommended to use the "Desktop Mode" and "Auto Hide Desktop Icons" in the DimensionTwo settings
GuideText5: Because it is a third-party desktop program, some system functions can not be used normally, such as copy,paste and undo, sorry for the inconvenience
